text: Hianagi Ra Anumzana tamagri Anumzamo'ma hunte'ne'nia kumateke negahaze. Ana ne'zama nenetma musema hanazana tamagrane, a'mofavretamine, ve eri'za vahetamine, a' eri'za vahetamine, tamagranema nemaniza Livae naga'enena, Ra Anumzana tamagri Anumzamofo avurera ne'zana nenetma, musena hutma monora huntegahaze.
